entry.key: SignThanks to some recent repairs on the space suits the thrusters no longer work properly (I'm looking at you Slate)
entry.value: Thanks to some recent repairs on the space suits the thrusters no longer work properly (I'm looking at you Slate)

entry.key: SignSo now the OUTER WILDS VENTURES space program requires its astrounauts to learn a new skill, climbing!
entry.value: So now the OUTER WILDS VENTURES space program requires its astrounauts to learn a new skill, climbing!

entry.key: SignTo do it you need to: \\n 1. Get close to a wall.\\n 2. Climb said wall.\\n 3. Act as if you where flying the suit.\\n
entry.value: To do it you need to: \\n 1. Get close to a wall.\\n 2. Climb said wall.\\n 3. Act as if you where flying the suit.\\n

entry.key: SignDouble-sided tape was added to the suits to allow better adhesion into surfaces, so don't forget it
entry.value: Double-sided tape was added to the suits to allow better adhesion into surfaces, so don't forget it

entry.key: SignYou can also jump from the wall while you are climbing if needed
entry.value: You can also jump from the wall while you are climbing if needed

entry.key: SignYes yes, I know the suit thrusters are broken, so to compansate for that I made some modifications to the booster in your suit
entry.value: Yes yes, I know the suit thrusters are broken, so to compansate for that I made some modifications to the booster in your suit

entry.key: SignYou can now dash to wherever you look, even if you are in 0g or not!
entry.value: You can now dash to wherever you look, even if you are in 0g or not!

entry.key: SignJust press the booster button while in the air and dash to wherever you desire!
entry.value: Just press the booster button while in the air and dash to wherever you desire!

entry.key: SignBut please, just don't try to boost to the floor while you are falling
entry.value: But please, just don't try to boost to the floor while you are falling

entry.key: SignThese strange marshmellows just started to appear everywhere on the solar system
entry.value: These strange marshmellows just started to appear everywhere on the solar system

entry.key: SignOn the pause menu you can find hints about their locations within a planet
entry.value: On the pause menu you can find hints about their locations within a planet

entry.key: SignIf no more collectibles exist in a planet no new hints will show
entry.value: If no more collectibles exist in a planet no new hints will show

entry.key: SignThe planets and locations that might have collectibles are: \\n 1. Timber Hearth.\\n 2. Attlerock.\\n 3. Orbital Probe Cannon.\\n 4. Giant's Deep.\\n 5. White Hole.\\n 6. Brittle Hollow.\\n 7. Ember Twin.\\n 8. Dark Bramble.\\n 9. Interloper.\\n
entry.value: The planets and locations that might have collectibles are: \\n 1. Timber Hearth.\\n 2. Attlerock.\\n 3. Orbital Probe Cannon.\\n 4. Giant's Deep.\\n 5. White Hole.\\n 6. Brittle Hollow.\\n 7. Ember Twin.\\n 8. Dark Bramble.\\n 9. Interloper.\\n

entry.key: SignI wonder what happens when you collect all of them
entry.value: I wonder what happens when you collect all of them

entry.key: At the start of the Mineshaft
entry.value: At the start of the Mineshaft

entry.key: At the ZeroG Cave, look up
entry.value: At the ZeroG Cave, look up

entry.key: When at the satellite, look for rocks
entry.value: When at the satellite, look for rocks

entry.key: The waterfall close to the nomai mine
entry.value: The waterfall close to the nomai mine

entry.key: Nomai Mine Outside Out Of Bounds
entry.value: Nomai Mine Outside Out Of Bounds

entry.key: Did you know that some rocks next to the mine entrance have gaps?
entry.value: Did you know that some rocks \\n next to the mine entrance have gaps?

entry.key: Nomai Mine Inside End Of Beam
entry.value: Nomai Mine Inside End Of Beam

entry.key: Look where the beam at the mine should lead to
entry.value: Look where the beam at the mine should lead to

entry.key: Some ships have seen better days
entry.value: Some ships have seen better days

entry.key: At the top of Gabbro Island
entry.value: At the top of Gabbro Island

entry.value: The grid at the Statue Island

entry.value: The Arch at the Statue Island
